string.u: Don\'t have an account?Sign up now

resources.string: Enter your registered mobile number and email below:
Your order has been successfully placed!
Your previous orders are listed below:
You don\'t have any favourite restaurants
You have not placed any orders
Q.1 What kind of restaurants are listed on Yummy Meals?
We have more than 15+ top restaurants listed. Our restaurants offer multiple cuisine options including Chinese, Indian, Burgers, Pizza, Tadkas, Smoothie and so on. You name it, we have it!
In order to keep the food fresh and hot, we deliver up to 7–8 km from our partnered restaurant. We are expanding rapidly and we will be delivering in your area very soon.
Q.2 Why aren\'t you delivering to my area yet?
Q.3 Can I place a take away order as well?
Yes you can place take away order at no extra cost and pick it up whenever you want.
Q.4 How much do you charge for delivery fee?
We charge a fixed delivery fee of Rs.200 (up to 4 km) and Rs.60 per additional km over 4 kms.
We deliver up to 7–8 km from our partnered restaurant which is almost double the distance as compared to other delivery companies.
Q.5 How far do you deliver from your partnered restaurant?
Q.6 How long will it take for my order to be delivered?

Our average delivery time is between 30–40 min once we receive the order. Delivery time depends on a lot of factors such as restaurant’s order volume, our current order volume, traffic, weather, overall distance, order size etc. We always try to do our best and if there is any delay, we always try to convey it to you.
Yes you can track your order using GPS. Once the driver starts the delivery you will receive a link on your phone/computer. Just tap on that link and you can track your order in real time.
Q.7 Can I track my order?
Q.8 How can I know about your latest offers and promotions?
We keep giving special offers and discounts to our customers. Please follow our page \'Yummy Meals\' on facebook to enjoy our latest offers and promotions.
Q.9 Can I edit my order?

Your order can be edited before it reaches the restaurant. Call us on +91 8086284556 or email us at info@yummymeals.co.in to do so. Once the order is placed and the restaurant starts preparing your food, you may not be able to edit its contents.

Any major change in delivery address is not possible after you have placed an order with us. However, slight modifications like changing the flat number, street name, landmark etc. are allowed. Please get in touch with our team for that.
Q.10 Can I change the delivery address after placing the order?
Q.11 I have a big party coming up, can I get some special discount?
For party arrangements and bulk orders we can offer some special offers and discounts. Get in touch with us at info@yummymeals.co.in
Got Some Questions in mind? We would love to answer any other query at +91–8086284556 or query@yummymeals.co.in
